revisions.rev:
[[Hauptseite | Deutsche Version]] __NOTOC__ = [[Datei:Wollmux_logo_medium.gif]] - Munich's letterhead and form system = The Wollmux is an extension for [http://www.openoffice.org OpenOffice.org] / [http://www.documentfoundation.org LibreOffice] developed by the [http://www.muenchen.de/int/en City Administration of Munich]. WollMux adds functions to OpenOffice.org / LibreOffice, to make the handling of templates, forms and letterheads much easier. Because WollMux is OpenSource and available for everyone, it is also used by other public administrative bodies and corporations. To find out, what WollMux can do, look here: '''[[Features|WollMux Features]]''' (in German only)
{{:News}} '''[[News|News...]]'''
Download WollMux *'''[http://code.google.com/p/wollmux/downloads/detail?name=WollMux-11.10a-installer.exe WollMux 11.10a]''' ([[Datei:Windows-icon.png]] Windows, 3MB) *'''[http://code.google.com/p/wollmux/downloads/detail?name=wollmux-config-de-11.11a-installer.exe&can=2&q= WollMux-configuration 11.11a]''' ([[Datei:Windows-icon.png]] Windows, deutsch, 4MB) * [[Download|Linux/other OS & languages]] In order to use WollMux you need a WollMux configuration!
== Documentation == '''[[:Kategorie:WollMux Handbook|WollMux Handbook]]''' - How-to manuals for WollMux and its configuration. '''[http://www.wollmux.net/wiki/images/8/8e/FormularMax_Handbuch.pdf FormularMax Handbook (PDF - German language)]''' - Handbook on how to create forms with WollMux (FM4000). English version available soon. '''[[Mailinglisten|Mailing lists]]''' - for further help use our mailing lists. == Source Code == WollMux is an OpenSource-peoject (licensed under [http://joinup.ec.europa.eu/software/page/eupl European Union Public License]). The source code can be found in our '''[http://code.google.com/p/wollmux/ source code repository]'''. Instructions on how to check out the source code from the repository and how to compile WollMux can be found on the Wiki Page '''[[Repository]]'''. If you have further questions use our '''[[Mailinglisten | mailing lists.]]''' == Error messages == Bugs in WollMux can be submitted using the public [http://code.google.com/p/wollmux/issues/list issue tracker] on Google Code. == Links== [[Datei:Limux_power.gif|right|link=http://www.muenchen.de/limux]] * http://code.google.com/p/wollmux/ - WollMux-repository on Google Code * http://www.muenchen.de/wollmux - WollMux-on muenchen.de * http://www.muenchen.de/limux - Informationen on the LiMux project * http://joinup.ec.europa.eu/software/wollmux/description - WollMux project on Joinup * http://wiki.stadt.freiburg.de/ooo/ - Freiburg's OpenOffice.org-Wiki Freiburg [[Category:WollMux English]]
